verbs.description: [ARG0: US Ambassador to the UN Nikki Haley] [V: rebuked] [ARG1: the Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights] [ARG2: for " hypocrisy "] [ARGM-LOC: in its call for an end to a Trump administration policy that could lead to the separation of families detained on the US southern border] .

US Ambassador to the UN Nikki Haley rebuked the Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights for " hypocrisy " in its call for an end to a Trump administration policy that [V: could] lead to the separation of families detained on the US southern border .

US Ambassador to the UN Nikki Haley rebuked the Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights for " hypocrisy " in its call for an end to [ARG0: a Trump administration policy] [R-ARG0: that] [ARGM-MOD: could] [V: lead] [ARG2: to the separation of families detained on the US southern border] .

US Ambassador to the UN Nikki Haley rebuked the Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights for " hypocrisy " in its call for an end to a Trump administration policy that could lead to the separation of [ARG1: families] [V: detained] [ARGM-LOC: on the US southern border] .
